item.description: Spring weather has arrived & with it Spring Fever! The Wee Ones are feeling Frisky and want a chance to Socialize and Play. Come down and join us as we drive the snakes away, hunt for four leaf clovers, and try to catch a leprechaun to grant us 3 wishes! Special treat for all pups who are wearing a bit o the green. Sunday March 18th from 11am-1pm Proof of updated vaccines required: Rabies, DHLPP, Bordatella
item.name: St. Patrick's Day Meet up!
